column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: The------ five-star Intercontinental Hotel in Phnom Penh
column4: now renamed the Great Duke in early 2018
column5: is now shutting down from December 31
column6: 2019. .------Hotel staff  have been made  unemployed. The letter dated 20 December has been leaked to the press. There were previous complaints by staff over late salaries last month.
